columns.name: Time Conversation Started
columns.description: The exact local date and time the chat was initiated by the user

columns.name: Time Conversation Ended
columns.description: The exact local date and time the chat ended based on the conditions previously discussed

columns.name: Purpose of Customer Chat
columns.description: What the user was looking for (the purpose of initiating the chat)

columns.name: Assistance Provided
columns.description: How the chatbot was able to assist the user

columns.name: Products Inquired About
columns.description: What products did the customer inquire about?

columns.name: Complaints Raised
columns.description: Criticisms or complaints the user raised about the company or its products.

columns.name: Customer Tone
columns.description: A short description of the customer's perceived tone during the chat (for example: hostile, neutral, friendly, etc.)

columns.name: Follow-Up Required By Sales
columns.description: Are there any actions a human sales agent should follow up on? (for example: providing more details about a product)

columns.name: Follow-Up Required By Customer Support
columns.description: Are there any actions a human customer support agent should follow up on? (for example: addressing a complaint about a product)

columns.name: Follow-Up Required By Management
columns.description: Are there any actions company management should follow up on? (for example: a complaint about an employee)

columns.name: Chat Summary
columns.description: A brief summary of the main points discussed in the chat

columns.name: Additional Noteworthy Information
columns.description: Any other information you find relevant or that may require follow-up
